content:
@Michelle M Miller : Have you already applied the changes in triaged/fhir/intros and notes_BAM_254-262.docx ?
It's not renamed to done, but I think the changes have all been commited?
The same document can appear in multiple folders. Yes, I did apply the Patient Care changes and renamed the document in the "pc" folder as done. I did not rename the document in the other folders

To elaborate, the document contained changes for Questionnaire (which is now owned by FHIR-I) and I didn't make those changes -- I only applied changes for the Patient Care owned resources (e.g. Procedure, Linkage)
oh ok, I didn't realize that. but that explains it!
